Description: Music only (as in an instrumental work or a wordless chorus without text e.g. Daphnis and Cloe).

Music and text combined (as in a vocal and instrumental work such as the musical JESUS CHRIST SUPERSTAR), where both contributions were specifically created for the respective musical composition with words.

Music and text combined (as in a vocal and instrumental work such as an opera), where both contributions were not specifically created for the respective musical composition with words (as in the musical CATS).
